products.desc: Torterra is a Grass-type Level-Up Pokémon LV.X card. It was first released as part of the Diamond & Pearl expansion. A purchase will net you 1x Toterra LV.X card.
Arceus is a Colorless-type Level-Up Pokémon LV.X card. It was first released as part of the Arceus expansion.

Comes with 4 booster packs, 2x Dedenne GX, 65 card sleeves, 1x tournament-legal coin, a set of damage counters, a set of die, a pack of 100 energy cards, and a box that you can store pokemon cards in.
Comes with 7 booster packs, 1x Dragapult V, 1x Dragapult VMAX, a promotional jumbo coin, and one promotional jumbo card.
Comes with 7 booster packs, 1x Dragapult V, 1x Dragapult VMAX, a promotional jumbo coin, and one promotional jumbo card.
Contains 30 booster packs of the Japan-only Sky Legends expansion to the Pokemon TCG. All cards are in Japanese.
Comes with 10 booster packs, 1x Charizard V, 65 card sleeves, 45 Pokémon TCG Energy cards, and a box that you can store pokemon cards in.
